Package org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.reasoner

Interface Summary
Query Represents a conjunctive DL-safe query over an ontology.
Reasoner Provides methods to answer questions over an ontology.
SubsumptionHierarchy Represents a subsumption hierarcy for atomc classes in an ontology.
SubsumptionHierarchy.Node Represents a node in the subsumption hiearchy.
 

Class Summary
Query.UntypedPredicate Models a predicate whose type is not known.
 

Enum Summary
Reasoner.AxiomProcessingStage An enumeration of different stages in axiom processing.
Reasoner.RuleProcessingStage An enumeration of different stages in rule processing.
